body_html:
@ezyang When I got this error (I didn't start python from inside the pytorch directory):

Python 2.7.15 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, May 1 2018, 23:32:55) [GCC 7.2.0] on linux2 Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> from caffe2.python import core
Traceback (most recent call last): File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module> File "/home/forestriveral/anaconda3/envs/mrcnn/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/python/__init__.py", line 2, in <module> from caffe2.proto import caffe2_pb2 ImportError: cannot import name caffe2_pb2

In /home/forestriveral/anaconda3/envs/mrcnn/, I run find -name caffe2_pb2* and it says nothing. Then I find that there was empty in /home/forestriveral/anaconda3/envs/mrcnn/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/proto/. But I run this command inside the pytorch directory, it says:

forestriveral@HanazawaKana:~/DeepLearning/object-detection/pytorch$ find -name caffe2_pb2*
./build/caffe2/proto/caffe2_pb2.py
./torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/proto/caffe2_pb2.py
./torch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/proto/caffe2_pb2.py

Does this mean that I need to rebuild caffe2 ? Or any other solutions?

In /home/forestriveral/anaconda3/envs/mrcnn/, I run find -name caffe2_pb2* and it says nothing. Then I find that there was empty in /home/forestriveral/anaconda3/envs/mrcnn/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/proto/. But I run this command inside the pytorch directory, it says:
forestriveral@HanazawaKana:~/DeepLearning/object-detection/pytorch$ find -name caffe2_pb2*

Does this mean that I need to rebuild caffe2 ? Or any other solutions?
body:
@ezyang When I got this error (I didn't start python from inside the pytorch directory): 

`Python 2.7.15 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, May  1 2018, 23:32:55) 
[GCC 7.2.0] on linux2
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.`
`>>> from caffe2.python import core`
`Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/forestriveral/anaconda3/envs/mrcnn/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/python/__init__.py", line 2, in <module>   from caffe2.proto import caffe2_pb2
ImportError: cannot import name caffe2_pb2`

In `/home/forestriveral/anaconda3/envs/mrcnn/`, I run `find -name caffe2_pb2*` and it says nothing. Then I find that there was empty in `/home/forestriveral/anaconda3/envs/mrcnn/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/proto/`. But I run this command inside the pytorch directory, it says:

`forestriveral@HanazawaKana:~/DeepLearning/object-detection/pytorch$ find -name caffe2_pb2* `
`./build/caffe2/proto/caffe2_pb2.py `
`./torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/proto/caffe2_pb2.py`
`./torch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/proto/caffe2_pb2.py`

Does this mean that I need to rebuild caffe2 ? Or any other solutions?
